import React , { Component } from "react"; import Helmet from "react-helmet"; import { WEBSITE_NAME } from "../../../utils/websiteData"; import './blog.css' import Offer from './Offer'; import DonationIcon from '../../images/donation-icon.svg'; import Solidarity from '../../images/solidarity.svg'; import BloodIcon from '../../../images/blood-icon.svg'; import Other from '../../images/other.svg'; class Offers extends Component { state = { posts: [ { id: 'asfa1', title: 'Social aides' , desc:'some valu'}, { id: 'vasdf1', title: 'Medical services' , desc:'description'}, { id: 'vasdd2', title: 'Solidarity services' , desc:''}, { id: 'asdf11', title: 'Others services' , desc:''} ], sub : [ { id: 'asfa2', title: 'file' , desc:''}, { id: 'vasdf3', title: 'topic' , desc:''}, { id: 'vasdd4', title: 'os' , desc:''}, { id: 'asdf15', title: 'yes' , desc:''} ], showOffers: false } render(){ return(
{`${WEBSITE_NAME} | Offers`} {/**/}
Social aides

Give donations to those in need of money, tools or resources , specially ...

Medical Services

Help patients in their chirurgical operations or medical treatment

Solidarity services

Add a request to benefit of our list of donations

Social aides

Give donations to those in need of money, tools or resources , specially ...

) }} export default Offers ;
